Title: Colorado Avalanche hockey club: To replace the current goal horn with the previous Avalanche Warning horn used in 2001
Overview: To correctly display the demographics of the beautiful state that is Colorado the Colorado Avalanche hcokey club should change the goal horn to the perivous one used in which included a loud and apparently Avalanche Warning horn. This would both allow the current Avalnche squad to compete with the Stanley Cup winning attitude of the pervious generation as well as being a bad ass sounding horn to hear
Letter Body: To replace the current goal horn with the previous Avalanche Warning horn used in 2001
